Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: GetUrFaithUp
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gif for my mom who still owns a flip phone and is always taking pictures with the outdated grainy camera. She Loves it!

Reviews.Title: Two Tripods?
Reviews.Author: Scotty Crusoe
Reviews.Content: The camera is good and does everything I wanted. The "bundle"was not such a good idea. The bag is too big for the camera and the bundle gave me two pint-sized tripods for the camera when I didn't really need one. Plus there are extras I bought that I will probably never use. The camera by itself would have been a good purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor for exceptional performance.
5x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens delivers stunning images.
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button.
New ECO Mode helps reduce power consumption for longer battery life.
Scene Modes such as Fisheye Effect, Toy Camera Effect and Monochrome provide creative freedom to capture your photos.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video Recording (Black) + 8GB Memory Card + Compact Camera Case + Accessory Kit
